explains: n. 异端；异端邪说；异教

sentences.en: He was burned at the stake for heresy.
sentences.cn: 他因为信奉异端思想而以火刑处死。

sentences.en: What Bracey is saying is tantamount to heresy.
sentences.cn: 布里斯正在说的无异于异端邪说。

sentences.en: It might be considered heresy to suggest such a notion.
sentences.cn: 提出这样的见解可能会被认为是异端邪说。
